alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 7:57AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Galveston, northeastern Brazoria, south central Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 757 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Anahuac to near Hillcrest. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... League City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, southern Seabrook, Hitchcock, Kemah, Galveston Pier 21, Bayou Vista, Clear Lake Shores, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Hillcrest, San Leon, Scholes Field and Port Bolivar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
